Ears.name: Ears
Ears.description: The Ears class. Where Awesome happens

classitems.description: Returns the unwrapped raw object (ie The stuff between the ears ;) )
classitems.name: raw

return.description: Returns the original (perhaps mutated) raw object absent any ears funtionality

classitems.description: Attaches an event handler to one or more events on the object
classitems.name: on

params.name: evts
params.description: A string consisting of a space speerated list of one or more event names to listen for

params.name: handler
params.description: The function to be executed upon the occasion of the specfied event(s)

classitems.description: Attaches an event handler to one or more events
classitems.name: off

params.name: evts
params.description: A string consisting of a space speerated list of one or more event names to cease listening for

params.name: handler
params.description: The function originally attached as the handler to the specified event(s)

classitems.description: Gets the value of a property on the managed object
classitems.name: get

params.name: property
params.description: The name of the property to retrieve the value of.

return.description: The value of the property on the object, or undefined if it does not exist

classitems.description: Sets the value of a property on the managed object
classitems.name: set

params.name: property
params.description: The name of the property to set the value of.

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the property being set

classitems.description: Removes a property from the managed object
classitems.name: remove

params.name: property
params.description: The name of the property to be removed.

classitems.description:
Attaches an event handler to one or more events on another object.
This is essentailly the same as `on` only from the perspective of the
subscriber to the event, rather than the publisher.
classitems.name: listenTo

params.name: evts
params.description: A string consisting of a space speerated list of one or more event names to listen for

params.name: ears
params.description: The object being lisented to (The event publisher)

params.name: handler
params.description: The function to be executed upon the occasion of the specfied event(s)

classitems.description:
Removes an event handler from one or more events on another object.
This is essentailly the same as `off` only from the perspective of the
subscriber to the event, rather than the publisher.
classitems.name: ignore

params.name: evts
params.description: A string consisting of a space speerated list of one or more event names to cease listening to

params.name: ears
params.description: The object whos event is no longer to be lisented to (The event publisher)

params.name: handler
params.description: The function that was originally bound to the event.

params.name: evts
params.description: A string consisting of a space speerated list of one or more event names to dispatch

params.name: Data
params.description: to be included in the dispached event object.
